metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25435 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
libtiff 4.5.0 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via extractContigSamplesShifted8bits() at /libtiff/tools/tiffcrop.c:3753.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25435` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11+esm7
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11+esm7
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11+esm7
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11+esm7
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: mdeslaur> invalid read, DoS only ccdm94> same fix as the one for CVE-2023-25434, which is also the same fix as the one for CVE-2023-0795.

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.11+esm7').
